name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.block.access.key.update.interval
description: Interval in minutes at which namenode updates its access keys.

name: dfs.qjournal.start-segment.timeout.ms
description: Quorum timeout in milliseconds for starting a log segment.

name: dfs.blockreport.intervalMsec
description: Determines block reporting interval in milliseconds.

name: dfs.client.key.provider.cache.expiry
description: DFS client security key cache expiration in milliseconds.

name: dfs.http.client.failover.sleep.max.millis
description:
Specify the upper bound of sleep time in milliseconds between
    retries or failovers for WebHDFS client.

name: dfs.stream-buffer-size
description:
The size of buffer to stream files.
  The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware
  page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is
  buffered during read and write operations.
